mapper.select: SELECT job_group_code AS jobGroupCode, job_group_name AS jobGroupName FROM ( SELECT user_id, MAX(user_generation) FROM blind.user_mgt WHERE company_id = #{companyId} AND logical_del_flag = '0' GROUP BY user_id ) AS us INNER JOIN blind.salary_rank_mgt AS sa USING(user_id) INNER JOIN blind.job_group_mst AS jo USING(job_group_code) WHERE sa.logical_del_flag = '0' AND jo.logical_del_flag = '0'

SELECT MIN(salary) AS minAnnualIncome, ROUND(AVG(salary), 0) AS avgAnnualIncome, MAX("blind".salary_rank_mgt.salary) AS maxAnnualIncome FROM blind.salary_rank_mgt INNER JOIN ( SELECT user_id, MAX(user_generation) FROM blind.user_mgt WHERE company_id = #{companyId} AND logical_del_flag = '0' GROUP BY user_id ) AS us USING(user_id) WHERE logical_del_flag = '0'
AND job_group_code = #{jobGroupCode}
